message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for a starting point.
Alice, let's be practical. I'll agree to a 55/45 split in my favor to end this quickly. Otherwise, the pot shrinks, and neither of us benefits.
Bob, you're right about the shrinking pot. I'll accept a 55/45 split, but in my favor this time. It's only fair considering I made the first move.
